text: Benjamin Scott Giroux (born October 24, 1984) is an American actor, director and producer. He is best known for portraying The Toddler in Henry Danger, The Adventures of Kid Danger and Danger Force on Nickelodeon, Mikey Munroe in Bunsen Is a Beast also for Nickelodeon, and Little Zach in Hart of Dixie for The CW. He is also set to voice the main character in Big Nate from Nickelodeon on Paramount+. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona Category:American voice actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers
title: Ben Giroux
